definition: to stress/to emphasize/particular about sth/to strive for
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: " Sound rhythm" is an important characteristic of poems.
sentences.chinese: “声律”的讲求是诗歌语言艺术的重要特点。

sentences.english: The Italians are eminently practical, and everything must have its use.
sentences.chinese: 意大利人讲求实际是出了名的，一切都要物尽其用。

sentences.english: In the movie, Confucius talks of changing oneself from within.
sentences.chinese: 影片中，孔子讲求从内心深处来改变一个人。

sentences.english: There's balance between use and preservation.
sentences.chinese: 在使用与保存之间要讲求平衡。

sentences.english: The unique feature of this book is its down-to-earth practicality.
sentences.chinese: 这本书所独有的特点就是其讲求实际的实用性。

sentences.english: He advocated the editorial principles of letting a hundred schools of thought contend and attaching great importance to the academic quality.
sentences.chinese: 提倡百家争鸣，讲求学术质量是他的编辑思想。

sentences.english: Grooming and privgot hygiene haudio-videoe i've been around for matures.
sentences.chinese: 仪容整洁和个人卫生的讲求已经行之有年了。

sentences.english: We want to be productive and see with our own eyes what we have made.
sentences.chinese: 我们讲求成效，希望亲眼看见自己做出的成果。

sentences.english: You are entering an enterprise pursuing practical results, so demonstrate your value with performance.
sentences.chinese: 你进入的是一家讲求实效的企业，请用你的业绩说话。

sentences.english: Did not focus on direct evidence of sub-type.
Work hard and effectively, but you can also have some fun.
sentences.chinese: 要勤奋工作，讲求成效，但是也要找点乐儿。

sentences.english: In order to defeat a strong army, a weak army must carefully choose favourable terrain as a battleground.
sentences.chinese: 弱军要战胜强军，是不能不讲求阵地这个条件的。

sentences.english: It’s both productive and, of course, relaxing.
sentences.chinese: 它既有创造性，当然又讲求放松。

sentences.english: He did not bother about amall matters in personal behaviour and in being an official.
sentences.chinese: 他为人和做官都不拘小节，讲求实效。

sentences.english: The Chinese civilization has always given prominence to good neighborliness.
sentences.chinese: 中华文明历来注重亲仁善邻，讲求和睦相处。

definition: to pay particular attention to/carefully selected for quality/tastefully chosen
to hold up (as an model)/to hold in esteem/to revere/to advocate
doctrine of the mean/moderation in all things
to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly/to seek after/to woo
to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
to stress in a prejudiced way/to emphasize sth unduly
the one and only way/the only proper course to take
